title: Parent challenges traffic safety near schools
description: Parent challenges traffic safety near schools
content:
Scenario: Parent challenges traffic safety near schools
    Given traffic speeds and volume near the school create danger
    And the parent has witnessed multiple near-miss incidents
    When the parent reviews Observer's traffic safety data
    Then they see documented speeding violations near school hours
    And learn which other schools have traffic calming measures
    And understand city transportation department can install measures
    And coordinate with school principal and other parents
    And municipal traffic safety includes school zone protection
